pages.text: 76|26|bamjung-eneun geubun-eul wihae buboghago bam-ui olaen sigan-e geubun-eul chan-yanghala
76|27|sillo ideul-eun hyeonseleul salanghamyeo mugeoun nal-eul dwilo naebeolyeodudeola
76|28|sillo naega geudeul-eul changjohayeossgo geudeul-ui golgyeog-eul ganghage hayeossnola. naega wonhaessdamyeon geudeulgwa yusahan jadeullo jeongnyeonghi (geudeul-eul) daechehaess-eul geos-ila
76|29|sillo igeos-eun tteoollim-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-eul jab-eula
76|30|geudaedeul-i wonham-eun ojig hananimkkeseo wonhasigi ttaemun-ila. sillo hananimkkeseoneun asineun bun-imyeo jihyelousin bun-idoda
76|31|geubunkkeseoneun wonhasineun jaleul dangsin-ui jabi sog-e deulge hasinola. geuligo budanghan jadeul, geudeul-eul wihae geubunkkeseoneun gotongseuleon beol-eul junbihasyeossnola
77|12|geudeul-ui gihan-eun eotteon nal-eul wihae jijeongdoen geos-inga
77|14|mueos-i geudaeege bunliui nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
77|15|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|17|geu hu naneun ihu salamdeul-i geudeul-eul dwittaleudolog hayeossnola
77|19|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
